title: Robert Pattinson reveals his Batman voice has been inspired by The Lighthouse co-star Willem Dafoe
text:
He'll be transforming his voice for his new role as the Caped Crusader.

And Robert Pattinson has revealed he didn't need to look too far to find the inspiration behind his new speech.

The actor, 33, plans on modelling his Batman voice after Willem Dafoe, he revealed in an interview with Access.

'It is pretty similar': Robert Pattinson has revealed he didn't need to look too far to find the inspiration behind his new Batman voice

Robert and Willem star together in the upcoming drama The Lighthouse, and the actor explained his co-star's voice in the film resembled the style he was looking for.

'Willem's voice in this is kind of inspiring for it, to be honest,' he explained.

'It is pretty similar, the voice I'm gonna do,' he added, before letting out a gruff noise.

'I think Batman has a sort of piratey kind of voice, I think that will really suit it,' he continued.

Iconic: Michael Keaton played the Caped Crusader in the 1989 film, Batman

Big shoes to fill! Robert will be the sixth star to play Batman on the big screen, following in the footsteps of George Clooney, Christian Bale, Val Kilmer, Christian Bale, and Ben Affleck (pictured October 2019)

Robert will be the sixth star to play Batman on the big screen, following in the footsteps of George Clooney, Christian Bale, Val Kilmer, Christian Bale, and Ben Affleck.

The actor reportedly beat out Nicholas Hoult for the lead role of the Caped Crusader in the upcoming DC Comics blockbuster.

Batman is set to begin pre-production in summer 2020, however there is no official start date for filming yet.

The cat's meow! Zoe Kravitz has joined the film as Catwoman

Matt Reeves will be directing the film, which is slated for a June 25, 2021 release date.

The latest big name to join the film was Zoe Kravitz, who will be playing Catwoman.

Fans can currently catch Robert and Willem playing lighthouse keepers on a remote and mysterious island in the new drama, The Lighthouse, which is now in theaters.
